title: Zscaler Internet Access - Email DLP
description: This dashboard provides insights into Data Loss Prevention (DLP) events related to email traffic as monitored by Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA).

definition.content:
[Zscaler Internet Access](https://www.zscaler.com/products-and-solutions/zscaler-internet-access) (ZIA) is a secure Internet and web gateway delivered as a service from the cloud.

This dashboard provides in-depth visibility into Email Data Loss Prevention (DLP) events detected by Zscaler Internet Access, enabling organizations to monitor, analyze, and act on potential data exfiltration via email.

For more information, see the [Zscaler Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/z-scaler/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
